coded_answer.p: I recivedreceived your letter and I am very excited about the camp.
I would like to go in July, I don't mind wichwhich two weeks, but it has to be that month because in June I am still in school and in August I'amI am going on holiday with my family.
I would prefer to sleep in a tent because I think it's different from where I sleep every night so I would apreciateappreciate it if there are still tents available.

One of the activities I would prefer to do is Climbing,. I haven't done a lot of it but I've always found it interesting and I think this would be a good opportunity to become better inat it. The other activity I would like to takedo is tennis, I'm quite good at it and I have been practisingplaying for four years.
I would like to know what type of clothes I should take and also if I need to take any money with me.
Hello girl, how are you doing thisthese days.? I amhave been great, especially last weekend inat the concert of Backstreet BoysBackstreet Boys concert. It was so exciting.

They were giving two concerts, one inon Friday and the other one inon Saturday they. They invited me to go on fridayFriday. This is what happened: when I arrivearrived they told me that I was helping in backstage with the scenery,; then the group arrived, we chat for like 15 minutes, then they had to go on stage. Here is where the good part starts, I was doing the courtinescurtains (opening and closing) when Nick came up to me and askasked me to go on stage with him, my. My heart started beating very hard. The next second I was in front of more than 2 thousand people dancing with The Backstreet Boys. I had a great time that day.
Well I have to go now. Hope to hear from you later on.
